message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe holds immense value and can significantly enhance your experience. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $120 for this exceptional item. This offer includes a 30-day satisfaction guarantee, allowing you to explore its features without any risk. I trust that you'll find its value exceeds the price, making it a worthwhile investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. Looking forward to your positive response.
